perturbation.original_text: 1. Hosting Agreement. This Agreement (including its Exhibit A and all other documents referenced herein) is entered into by eGain Communications Corporation ("eGain") and Eliance Corporation ("Customer") for the purpose of providing Customer with Web-based access to eGain's software specified in Exhibit A, including any updates, upgrades or revisions provided under this Agreement ("Software"), and certain other services relating to the processing of and response to online inquiries and messages ("Online Messages") received by Customer from its customers and other users of Customer's Web site ("Users").
perturbation.changed_text: 1. Hosting Agreement. This Agreement (including its Exhibit A and all other documents referenced herein) is entered into by eGain Communications Corporation ("eGain") and Eliance Corporation ("Subscriber") for the purpose of providing Subscriber with Web-based access to eGain's software specified in Exhibit A, including any updates, upgrades or revisions provided under this Agreement ("Software"), and certain other services relating to the processing of and response to online inquiries and messages ("Online Messages") received by Subscriber from its customers and other users of Subscriber's Web site ("Users").
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Customer' is replaced with 'Subscriber'. While seemingly similar, these terms can imply different obligations and rights. This introduces ambiguity about who is bound by specific obligations under the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: 2. Provision of Services. eGain will provide Customer with access, maintenance and related hosting services ("Hosting Services") to the Software installed on eGain's servers and other equipment (the "eGain System"). Customer agrees, as reasonably requested by eGain, to provide eGain with access to Customer's premises and equipment and to otherwise cooperate with eGain in performing the services. During the term of this Agreement, Customer may obtain information ("Reports") regarding Customer's use of the Software and the quantity and handling of Online Messages routed to the eGain System by accessing the eGain System through a password-protected Web site made available by eGain. Customer shall be responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of such passwords and shall permit only authorized employees of Customer to access the eGain System.
perturbation.changed_text: 2. Provision of Services. eGain will provide Subscriber with access, maintenance and related hosting services ("Hosting Services") to the Software installed on eGain's servers and other equipment (the "eGain System"). Account Holder agrees, as reasonably requested by eGain, to provide eGain with access to Account Holder's premises and equipment and to otherwise cooperate with eGain in performing the services. During the term of this Agreement, Subscriber may obtain information ("Reports") regarding Subscriber's use of the Software and the quantity and handling of Online Messages routed to the eGain System by accessing the eGain System through a password-protected Web site made available by eGain. Subscriber shall be responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of such passwords and shall permit only authorized employees of Subscriber to access the eGain System.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Customer' is now 'Subscriber' but also 'Account Holder' in the same paragraph. This creates confusion as to which entity is bound by the stated obligations within the same section of the agreement. This inconsistency introduces potential disputes regarding responsibility for providing access to premises and equipment.

perturbation.original_text: 3. Customer's Responsibilities. Customer agrees that it shall be responsible for providing and maintaining its own Internet access and all necessary telecommunications equipment, software and other materials ("Customer Equipment") at Customer's location necessary for accessing the Software and the eGain System through the Internet. Customer agrees to notify eGain of any changes in the Customer Equipment, including any system configuration changes or any hardware or software upgrades, which may affect the Hosting Services provided hereunder. The eGain System is only to be used for lawful purposes.
perturbation.changed_text: 3. Account Holder's Responsibilities. Subscriber agrees that it shall be responsible for providing and maintaining its own Internet access and all necessary telecommunications equipment, software and other materials ("Subscriber Equipment") at Subscriber's location necessary for accessing the Software and the eGain System through the Internet. Subscriber agrees to notify eGain of any changes in the Subscriber Equipment, including any system configuration changes or any hardware or software upgrades, which may affect the Hosting Services provided hereunder. The eGain System is only to be used for lawful purposes.
perturbation.explanation: Here, 'Customer' becomes 'Subscriber' and 'Account Holder' within the same section. Further, 'Customer Equipment' is redefined as 'Subscriber Equipment', but it's not clear if they are identical. This introduces ambiguity on which entity has the specific responsibilities and which equipment is being referred to.
